Bantu Culik dan Peras WN Inggris, 4 Oknum Polisi Diamankan
03 Nov 2019, 19:54 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Polisi mengamankan oknum anggota mereka yang ikut membantu menculik dan memeras WN Inggris atas nama Matthew Simon Craib. Ada 4 oknum polisi yang diamankan dalam kasus tersebut.
Kasus penculikan dan pemerasan itu tertuang dalam laporan polisi bernomor LP/7002/X/2019/PMJ/Ditreskrimum tertanggal 31 Oktober 2019 dengan pelapor VL, rekan Matthew. Kasus tersebut dibenarkan oleh Kadiv Propam Polri Irjen Listyo Sigit, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Dalam keterangan yang diterima, kasus ini bermula ketika korban Matthew, pada 29 Oktober 2019, memberi tahu rekannya yakni VL bahwa dia ingin bertemu seseorang terkait urusan pekerjaan. Pada 30 Oktober 2019 pukul 02.00 WIB, korban memberitahukan kepada VL sudah dalam perjalanan pulang dan ternyata diketahui diculik dengan para pelaku meminta tebusan sekitar USD 1 juta.
VL lantas membuat laporan pada Kamis (31/10/2019) sekitar pukul 08.00 WIB dan Ditreskrimum Polda Metro Jaya kemudian menindaklanjutinya. Sekitar pukul 13.00 WIB di kawasan Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, para pelaku ditangkap.
Total pelaku yang diamankan berjumlah 6 orang dengan 4 di antaranya adalah oknum kepolisian. Para pelaku tersebut adalah G (rekan kerja Matthew), NA (pacar G), Bripda JBB (Saudara NA), Bripda NPU (pacar Bripda JBB), Briptu H dan Bripda SBS. Masing-masing pelaku punya peran tersendiri.
Irjen Listyo menyebut kasus tersebut tengah diproses, termasuk oknum polisi yang terlibat.
"Ditangani Resmob Polda Metro, untuk pelanggaran disiplin dan kode etik ditangani Propam Metro, setelah proses penanganan pidana berkasnya selesai," kata Irjen Listyo.

(sam/gbr)

Help Kidnap and Squeeze British Citizens, 4 Police Officers Secured
03 Nov 2019, 19:54 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The police have secured members of those who helped kidnap and blackmail British citizens in the name of Matthew Simon Craib. There were 4 police officers who were secured in the case.
The abduction and extortion case was contained in a police report numbered LP / 7002 / X / 2019 / PMJ / Ditreskrimum dated 31 October 2019 with VL reporter, colleague Matthew. The case was justified by the National Police Head of Propam Police Inspector General Listyo Sigit, Sunday (3/11/2019).
In the information received, this case began when victim Matthew, on October 29, 2019, told his colleague VL that he wanted to meet someone related to work matters. On 30 October 2019 at 02.00 WIB, the victim told VL that he was on his way home and it was found that he had been kidnapped with the perpetrators asking for a ransom of around USD 1 million.
VL then made a report on Thursday (10/31/2019) around 08.00 WIB and the Jakarta Police Directorate General Criminal Investigation then followed up on it. At around 1:00 pm West Indonesian Time in the Kemayoran area, Central Jakarta, the perpetrators were arrested.
The total number of perpetrators secured was 6 people with 4 of them being police officers. The perpetrators are G (Matthew's colleague), NA (boyfriend G), Bripda JBB (Brother NA), Bripda NPU (boyfriend of Bripda JBB), Brigadier H and Bripda SBS. Each actor has his own role.
Inspector General Listyo said the case was being processed, including the police officers involved.
"Handled by the Metro Police Resmob, for violations of discipline and the code of ethics handled by Propam Metro, after the criminal handling process has been completed," said Inspector General Listyo.

(sam / pic)
